mode.description: Cropping and zooming modes for images

webp.description: By default, the webP format is not parsed, and only network resources are supported
webp.description_zh: 默认不解析 webP 格式，只支持网络资源

svg.description: By default, the svg format is not parsed, and svg images only support aspectFit
svg.description_zh: 默认不解析 svg 格式，svg 图片只支持 aspectFit

lazyLoad.description: Pictures lazy loading. Valid only for images under page and scroll-view
lazyLoad.description_zh: 图片懒加载。只针对 page 与 scroll-view 下的 image 有效

showMenuByLongpress.description: Turn on the menu of long-pressing the picture to display the recognition of the applet code
showMenuByLongpress.description_zh: 开启长按图片显示识别小程序码菜单

imgProps.description: An additional attribute added to the img tag
imgProps.description_zh: 为 img 标签额外增加的属性

nativeProps.description: Used to transparently transfer properties on WebComponents to internal H5 labels
nativeProps.description_zh: 用于透传 WebComponents 上的属性到内部 H5 标签上

defaultSource.description: Default image address, if the default image address is set, the default image will be displayed first, and the corresponding image will be rendered after the image corresponding to src is loaded successfully.
defaultSource.description_zh: 默认图片地址，若设置默认图片地址，会先显示默认图片，等 src 对应的图片加载成功后，再渲染对应的图片。

imageMenuPrevent.description: Prevents the default menu from popping up when you press and hold on an image (i.e., setting this property to image-menu-prevent="true" or image-menu-prevent), which is only valid during initialization and cannot be changed dynamically, and you do not need to set this property if you do not want to prevent the default menu from popping up. Note: The operation after pressing and holding the menu does not support SVG format at this time
imageMenuPrevent.description_zh: 阻止长按图片时弹起默认菜单（即将该属性设置为image-menu-prevent="true"或image-menu-prevent），只在初始化时有效，不能动态变更；若不想阻止弹起默认菜单，则不需要设置此属性。注：长按菜单后的操作暂不支持 svg 格式

preview.description: Click whether to preview the image. If the image does not listen for click events and the width is greater than 1/4 of the screen width, it will be enabled by default
preview.description_zh: 点击后是否预览图片。在不设置的情况下，若 image 未监听点击事件且宽度大于 1/4 屏宽，则默认开启

originalSrc.description: The address of the image that is displayed during preview
originalSrc.description_zh: 预览时显示的图片地址

ariaLabel.description_zh: 无障碍访问，（属性）元素的额外描述

onError.description: When an error occurs, the event name that is published to AppService, the event object
onError.description_zh: 当错误发生时，发布到 AppService 的事件名，事件对象

onLoad.description: When the image is loaded, the event name that is published to AppService, the event object
onLoad.description_zh: 当图片载入完毕时，发布到 AppService 的事件名，事件对象

onTap.description: Triggered when an image is clicked.

catchTap.description: Triggered when an image is clicked, preventing the event from bubbling.
catchTap.description_zh: 点击图片时触发，阻止事件冒泡。
